metadata.title: CVE-2024-53147 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:exfat: fix out-of-bounds access of directory entriesIn the case of the directory size is greater than or equal tothe cluster size, if start_clu becomes an EOF cluster(an invalidcluster) due to file system corruption, then the directory entrywhere ei->hint_femp.eidx hint is outside the directory, resultingin an out-of-bounds access, which may cause further file systemcorruption.This commit adds a check for start_clu, if it is an invalid cluster,the file or directory will be treated as empty.
